name: LARUDO (wip)
description:
Take up arms against the invading force trying to take over your homeland.

CONTROLS:

  • Move: WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Attack: Spacebar (Hold/Tap)
  • Auto-Attack: E
  • Change Speed: Q

WIP: This is a Minimum playable version of Larudo which only contains the first half of Level 1. Final Game to be around 8 Levels with 7 total weapons. The Player will level up as you progress through the game which will affect weapon shots and Satellite options. All assets are temporary until I can make or obtain higher quality versions.

Follow at below link for updates and other work I do:

https://www.facebook.com/LarudoCommunity

8/20: Updated background art and some models. Working on updating Mid_Boss model.

8/21: Updated Mid_Boss model and fixed some errors happening.
